action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A purple handbag is displayed on a wooden table alongside two cards, a wooden bowl filled with objects, two vases, and a candle. The table is positioned in front of a bookshelf with various items on it.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a selection of items on a round wooden table. There is a large pink purse leaning against the back of a wooden chair, two picture frames with colorful designs, a wooden bowl filled with purple items, and three vases of different colors and designs. There are also some books and other items on the table and around the table.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A purple handbag is displayed on a wooden table alongside two cards, a wooden bowl filled with objects, two vases, and a candle. The table is positioned in front of a bookshelf with various items on it.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Can you see any items hanging on the wall in your image?
